name: ECrimeX
description: Search the ECrimeX Malicious Domains and Phish repositories for information on malicious domains and phishing URLs

options.name: ECrimeX API Key
options.description: API Key used to authenticate to ECrimeX.  The user account associated with the API Key must have access to the ECrimeX Malicious Domain and Phish datasets.

options.name: Return Active Indicators Only
options.description: If enabled, the integration will only return indicators with a status of "Active".
